title: Access to FTP serverClient login details
text: Access to FTP server/Client login details Thursday, April 27, 2023 14:19 If a customer calls that they want to access the FTP server but they don’t have the username and password to access it. In such case we will go and login to ours DDD support tools and locate the client or customer over there. 1-Click on Client information as shown in the first snap shot Snap # 1 2-Locate group id for the customer, in this case it is 819 as shown in the 2nd snapshot. Snap # 2 3-Enter client id that has requested the login details, in this case the client id is 819069 (Ww Struer) as shown in 3rd snapshot. Snap # 3 After locating the client, one can easily find the username and password for the client FTP account as shown in snap # 4. Copy the username and password as shown in the rectangle and send it to the customer valid email address or call their specific contact number. Snap # 4
description:
Access to FTP server/Client login details

Thursday, April 27, 2023

14:19

 

If a customer calls that they want to access the FTP server but they don’t have the username and password to access it.

In such case we will go and login to ours DDD support tools and locate the client or customer over there.

 

1-Click on Client information as shown in the first snap shot

 

Snap # 1

 

 

 

2-Locate group id for the customer, in this case it is 819 as shown in the 2nd snapshot.

 

Snap # 2

 

 

3-Enter client id that has requested the login details, in this case the client id is 819069  (Ww Struer) as shown in 3rd snapshot.

 

Snap # 3

 

 

  1. After locating the client, one can easily find the username and password for the client FTP account as shown in snap # 4.
  2. Copy the username and password as shown in the rectangle and send it to the customer valid email address or call their specific contact number.

 

Snap # 4

title: DdD - Upload csv files to customer's ftp
text: DdD - Upload csv files to customer's ftp 13. december 2022 15:23 If the customer has problems with uploading csv files to the ftp, ask them to forward the csv file to you, then upload it. Open DdD Backoffice Supporttools Locate the customer Click Scheduled tasks Click Load Itemfile (Indlæs vareopl/tilgang standard (71) Here you can see how often the files are read from the ftp, which group they belong to (folder on ftp) and what the file is supposed to be named.
description:
DdD - Upload csv files to customer's ftp

13. december 2022

15:23

If the customer has problems with uploading csv files to the ftp, ask them to forward the csv file to you, then upload it.

 

Open DdD Backoffice Supporttools

 

Locate the customer

 

Click Scheduled tasks

 

Click Load Itemfile (Indlæs vareopl/tilgang standard (71)

 

Here you can see how often the files are read from the ftp, which group they belong to (folder on ftp) and what the file is supposed to be named.

title: DdD URL
text: DdD URL 4. november 2022 13:29 Open through Windows Explorer: ftp://ftp01.dddretail.com/ 71-filer – read from the customers C5 (economy system) as a csv file.
description:
DdD URL

4. november 2022

13:29

 

Open through Windows Explorer:

ftp://ftp01.dddretail.com/

 

71-filer – read from the customers C5 (economy system) as a csv file.

title: K3 SFTP access
text: K3 SFTP access Tuesday, 21 February 2023 08:59 When a customer needs to send and/or receive files, they can use the K3 SFTP for this. K3 doesn't accept the access to be open forever because of security reasons. Everytime the FTP is needed, we need to follow the process below The customer indicates via our customer portal (creating a new ticket or as a portal comment for an existing ticket) that they need access to K3's FTP server. The customer will also have to indicate until which date access is desired, because for security reasons the ftp accounts are no longer allowed to remain active all the time Support from K3 will create a ticket for the internal IT department indicating that for the customer the ftp user ftp.XXXX must be activated until date xx (indicated by the customer). As soon as Support from the IT department has feedback, this will be put in the relevant CRM case / ticket in order to inform the customer.
description:
K3 SFTP access

Tuesday, 21 February 2023

08:59

 

When a customer needs to send and/or receive files, they can use the K3 SFTP for this. K3 doesn't accept the access to be open forever because of security reasons. Everytime the FTP is needed, we need to follow the process below

 

 

The customer indicates via our customer portal (creating a new ticket or as a portal comment for an existing ticket) that they need access to K3's FTP server. The customer will also have to indicate until which date access is desired, because for security reasons the ftp accounts are no longer allowed to remain active all the time

 

 

Support from K3 will create a ticket for the internal IT department indicating that for the customer the ftp user ftp.XXXX must be activated until date xx (indicated by the customer).

 

As soon as Support from the IT department has feedback, this will be put in the relevant CRM case / ticket in order to inform the customer.
